title: Hollyoaks' Chelsee Healey turns heads in high Fendi boots as she larks around with Jennifer Metcalfe
text:
She never fails to turn heads.

And Chelsee Healey ensured all eyes would be on her as she larked around with co-stars at an exclusive Hollyoaks event on Tuesday night.

The actress, 31, smiled as she cosied up to Jennifer Metcalfe, 36, at Frederiks Bar in Liverpool City Center.

Designer outfit: Chelsee Healey, 30, wore a £340 Fendi black neoprene ruffle skirt and £1,200 knee length sock boots from the same designer

Wearing a £340 Fendi black neoprene ruffle skirt and £1,200 knee length sock boots from the same designer Chelsee laughed and joked as she posed for photos.

A thick black belt cinched in her waist and her glossy black hair fell in loose curls under a chic beige beret.

The former Waterloo Road star wore a heavy makeup look with false lashes, pink eye shadow and a dark lip liner.

She was joined by her Hollyoaks co-stars Imran Adams, David Tag, Jude Monk and Ross Adams at the exclusive event for the upcoming Who Shot Mercedes episodes.

Larking around: The actress, 31, smiled as she cosied up to Jennifer Metcalfe, 36, at Frederiks Bar in Liverpool City Center on Tuesday night

It comes after Chelsee broke down during an interview with The Sun as she revealed viewers brutally trolled her for her frosty behaviour on Celebs Go Dating.

She says critics blasted her parenting skills, suggesting she would teach her 19-month-old daughter Coco bad manners.

The actress revealed she was left heartbroken with the inclusion of her daughter, who she shares with jailbird ex-beau Jack Molloy, in the trolling.

In the candid chat, she said: 'Of the upsetting things I've read, the stuff that really gets to me is when they bring my baby into it.

Having fun: Chelsee didn't let past criticism get her down as she larked around with Jennifer at an exclusive Hollyoaks event

'I've had a lot of nasty comments. You can say whatever you want about me, but don't bring my daughter into it.

'I know I'm a good mum. I'd never teach her to have bad manners, because that's not me either. I'm not nasty.'

During her time on the show, she was scolded for being rude to potential suitors.

In one instance she told her date Vincent, 26, he was an 'ickle man' when he turned out to be shorter than she expected.

Dapper: Hollyoaks star Imran Adams arrived at the bar wearing tailored trousers, a loose fitting shirt and an oversized jacket

When Vincent entered the bar, where the duo played prosecco pong, the stylish stunner said: 'You are smaller than I thought.'

Seeming shocked by her comment, after just meeting her, he replied: 'Huh?' She continued: 'You are a small, little ickle man.'

In an interview to the camera, as she reflected on Vincent, Chelsee said: 'He may be an ickle man but I fancy him.'

Proving she had the hots for her date, despite her comments, the star decided to plant a kiss on his lips across the table and once again outside the venue.
description: Chelsee Healey, 31, smiled as she cosied up to Jennifer Metcalfe, 36, at Frederiks Bar in Liverpool City Center. She larked around with her co-star at the exclusive Hollyoaks event on Tuesday.
